body.header: What will you do when you're not sure about something?
body.section:
Look at these expressions:
Sorry, could you repeat that?
Could you say that again?
I didn't catch what you said?
I'm not sure what you mean by … ?
Do you mean … or … ?
I'm not sure what "urban" means.
Now look at the following clips:Dimitris realises he has nothing more to say: "Nothing else, really."
Zafir asks for clarification: "This is a little bit confusing, you mean … ?"
Alexandra hesitates to collect her thoughts before talking about the family.
Dimitris explains, "I don't see really a big difference".
These examples, and others you will notice during the other interviews, should reassure you.
You are not being tested on your general knowledge, but on your ability to communicate. There are no fixed answers! Concentrate on learning language skills and communication skills.
